roleset.name: bewilder with disappointment
roleset.note: DISMAY-V NOTES: Based on WSJ. Member of VNcls amuse-31.1. (from dismay.01-v)

example.name: passive
example.text: It also could put the government into the RU-486 business , which would please feminists-1 dismayed [*-1] at what they viewas pusillanimity in the private-sector drug industry .
example.arg: at what they view as pusillanimity in the private-sector drug industry
